channel.title: ParScape v2
channel.description:
[size=15pt]ParScape v2, FINNALY HERE! REMEMBER TO POST![/size]
[b][u]ParScape v1 & v2 FTW![/u][/b]
Well, it's finnaly here. ParScape v2. Added tons. Made the PKing ALOT BETTER! - Edge ftw! Ok, This time I used Figment as a base. And left a few things as Vato had them. So theres still GW mini and Fight Pits and Stoof. Didn't even attempt to add BH this time, it screwed up my first server way too badly o.O The hardest part was probably adding PK skulls. I still messed it up, It's the Fight Pit RED skull, but that don't matter too much. Yes, you can be on SILAB and the skull works ;) Anyways..... Ive decided to post it right now, because 377's are dieing with all the 503's out there.
Here's a list of stuff that I added...
[code]Removed a few commands (more stable community) Cleaned it up a LOT Every NPC talks, other then shops. They yell over head Desert Tresure 100%. New items =] Left the starting area edge, you can change Added Safe Zones where needed. No more wild at places like shops -.- Alot more objects & stoofs Changed starter outfit again... nothing special Changed a few bonuses to ones similer to RS ALMOST every item (rune stuff, torso, dh) has a defence requirement Great Edge PKing SILAB PK SKULL 100% DISAPPEARS AFTER A FEW MINS, AND WHEN YOU DIE IT DISAPPEARS ADDED SYI BLOCKER - WORKS 100% I THINKS XD God Swords & weapon specs Moved alot around Has about every skill Fletching has interfaces Auto casts & stoof Full wildy levels Range projectiles AND TONS MORE!!![/code]
For you lazy people... here's a command list.
[code]barrows delect or demote? (name) mod (name) runes arrows eat (name) pure master pnpc (npc id) admin (name) xteletome (name) god starter mine pkon pkoff unban(name) anti ban ipban rares (owner command) portals ghosts getpass (name) 1v1 staffzone purepk (1 def) shops kbd godwars tzar fightpits farm dungeon dungeongate rc food alchs staffmeeting (teles mod+ to you) bowtomaster (makes everyone bow to you) praise (same as above, but better) *** (name here) multi mb slayer stake agility ground home jail unjail pmodglow adminglow pmodglowoff adminglowoff ownerglow ownerglowoff wc kqueen cather smith mypk suggest master banuser ipban warn empty mystats rich (a smaller version of ::rares, for admins though) players kick[/code]
Now for The Pictures o.O
[img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN3.png[/img]
Thieve I will change in v3 [img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN4.png[/img]
[img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN6.png[/img]
New Shop area - Safezone [img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN7.png[/img]
Start of Desert Tresure [img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN8.png[/img]
[img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN9.png[/img]
[img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN10.png[/img]
Every NPC talk's, except for Shops [img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN11.png[/img]
[img]http://i309.photobucket.com/albums/kk382/wtfwthwdf/PSN13.png[/img]
I don't really use commands that give items, so if you want to give your players free stoofz, make your own commands -.-
[b]Client Download[/b] *
[b]Source Download[/b] *

item.title: ParScape v2
item.dc:creator: @Parscape Parscape
item.description:
@Parscape wrote:

[size=15pt]ParScape v2, FINNALY HERE! REMEMBER TO POST![/size]

ParScape v1 & v2 FTW!

Well, it’s finnaly here. ParScape v2. Added tons. Made the PKing ALOT BETTER! - Edge ftw!
Ok, This time I used Figment as a base. And left a few things as Vato had them. So theres still
GW mini and Fight Pits and Stoof. Didn’t even attempt to add BH this time, it screwed up my first server
way too badly o.O The hardest part was probably adding PK skulls. I still messed it up, It’s the Fight Pit RED skull,
but that don’t matter too much. Yes, you can be on SILAB and the skull works Anyways…
Ive decided to post it right now, because 377’s are dieing with all the 503’s out there.

Here’s a list of stuff that I added…

Removed a few commands (more stable community) Cleaned it up a LOT Every NPC talks, other then shops. They yell over head Desert Tresure 100%. New items =] Left the starting area edge, you can change Added Safe Zones where needed. No more wild at places like shops -.- Alot more objects & stoofs Changed starter outfit again... nothing special Changed a few bonuses to ones similer to RS ALMOST every item (rune stuff, torso, dh) has a defence requirement Great Edge PKing SILAB PK SKULL 100% DISAPPEARS AFTER A FEW MINS, AND WHEN YOU DIE IT DISAPPEARS ADDED SYI BLOCKER - WORKS 100% I THINKS XD God Swords & weapon specs Moved alot around Has about every skill Fletching has interfaces Auto casts & stoof Full wildy levels Range projectiles AND TONS MORE!!!

For you lazy people… here’s a command list.

barrows delect or demote? (name) mod (name) runes arrows eat (name) pure master pnpc (npc id) admin (name) xteletome (name) god starter mine pkon pkoff unban(name) anti ban ipban rares (owner command) portals ghosts getpass (name) 1v1 staffzone purepk (1 def) shops kbd godwars tzar fightpits farm dungeon dungeongate rc food alchs staffmeeting (teles mod+ to you) bowtomaster (makes everyone bow to you) praise (same as above, but better) *** (name here) multi mb slayer stake agility ground home jail unjail pmodglow adminglow pmodglowoff adminglowoff ownerglow ownerglowoff wc kqueen cather smith mypk suggest master banuser ipban warn empty mystats rich (a smaller version of ::rares, for admins though) players kick

Now for The Pictures o.O

PSN3.png765×503

Thieve I will change in v3

PSN4.png765×503

PSN6.png765×503

New Shop area - Safezone

PSN7.png765×503

Start of Desert Tresure

Every NPC talk’s, except for Shops

I don’t really use commands that give items, so if you want to give your players free stoofz, make your own commands -.-
